name: Do you wanna be a Super Hero?
blurb: Development of an App based on a superhero in which the voters (you) decide on the characteristics of the game including the image.

rewards.reward: Reward #1: You get my dearest gratitude and satisfaction to know that you are helping me out with this project.
Reward #2: Everything in Reward #1 plus you receive email notifications of how the progress is going and voting results.  In addition you get a downloadable copy of game.

Reward #3: Everything in Reward #2 plus you have now have earned voting rights and the power to shape the following game characteristics: story line, colors of characters, background scenery, and music. \r\nEach $25 donation is equal to one vote.  Buying multiple votes is acceptable in order to increase your voting power.

Reward #4:  Everything in Reward #3 plus you have now have earned voting rights and the power to shape the Superhero image.  How great is that!!  Based on your voting power,  it may be possible to have millions of people play YOU as our Superhero! \r\n \r\nHow the image voting works:  Everyone at the $100 level or more will receive an email requesting a head shot photograph of their choosing.  These photographs will be collected and put up at a website where the voting members get to vote on their favorite face.  Once the votes are in, our illustrator will use the image that received the most amount of votes to render a cartoon character head for our super hero. The image will also be part of the comic strips in the game.  Each $100 submission represents one vote on the image.  Buying multiple votes is acceptable in order to increase your voting power.
Reward #5: Everything in Reward #4 plus you will get your name on the credit screen which may be seen by millions.

Reward #6: This is my "product placement" offer. Your name or business name with phone number will be cleverly inserted somewhere in the city scene for everyone to see.  For instance, if your name is Billy Smith and you own a restaurant.  We can have a hotdog stand named "Billy's hotdog hut". After we are fully funded, we can discuss what your store should be and look like.  You also get everything in Rewards #5

Reward #7: Everything in Reward #3 plus you have now get your image as the villain of our game. After we are fully funded, you will receive an email requesting a head shot photograph of your choosing.  Our illustrator will that use that image to render a cartoon character head for our villain. The image will also be part of the comic strip also.  You also get everything in Rewards #5.  This is a unique opportunity and I'm only offering one of these.

Reward #8: Everything in Reward #4 plus you get your own special recognition screen with YOUR NAME ONLY.  This page can either be used for me to thank you or, if you would like, you can submit your own message for everyone to see.  NOTE: The message has to be acceptable to me that we could discuss before your contribution
